attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for premeditated murder,child murder,murder of our police force
attributes.additional_details:
We the under signed here by petition the british government to reinstate the death penalty for pre meditated murder; child murder and murder of our police force.

There is no excuse.

Three meals a day,warmth,a bed,training and career development in prisions is not punishment for these monsters.

The victims had no human rights they were taken away from them by these monsters.

The news of april jones has touched our hearts and brought back the memories of sarah,holly,jessica,and all the other children who were taken by such horrible monsters.

We as people of this country would like change.
